contentrichtext.text: {{Distinguish2|[[Tsallis statistics]]}} The '''Q-statistic''' is a [[test statistic]] output by either the [[Box-Pierce test]] or, in a modified version which provides better small sample properties, by the [[Ljung-Box test]]. It follows the [[chi-squared distribution]]. See also [[Portmanteau test]]. The '''q statistic''' or [[studentized range]] statistic is a statistic used for multiple significance testing across a number of means: see [[Tukeyâ€“Kramer method]]. {{Unreferenced|date=July 2010}} [[Category:Statistical tests]] {{statistics-stub}} [[de:Q-Statistik]]
